casebody.data:
Jose ARROYO et al.
v.
UNIVERSITY OF CONNECTICUT HEALTH CENTER et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 29, 2017 Michael G. Rigg, in support of the petition. Michael J. Walsh, in opposition.

The defendants' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn. App. 493 , 167 A.3d 1112 (2017), is denied.

ROBINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
